game.name: Shakes and Fidget
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Strategy, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, MMO, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option
game.shortDescription: Shakes & Fidget is a hilarious fantasy role-playing satire and at the same time, an award-winning RPG! Sounds crazy? With over 50 million enthusiastic players, it ranks among the most celebrated online role-playing games worldwide!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Shakes & Fidget is a hilarious fantasy role-playing satire and at the same time, an award-winning RPG! Sounds crazy? With over 50 million enthusiastic players, it ranks among the most celebrated online role-playing games worldwide!

reviewHighlights.text: Played the game years ago when it was browser only, had good memories. Now its one of the biggest p2w games out there. You can play on an old server a...
pay2win boring ass game. Waste of time, decent only when you "play" it with friends.
